abstract: Bill Cunningham notes that fashion shows staged by young members of art world attract new, more experimental type of audience.
lead_paragraph: Young members of the experimental art world and the unorthodox fashion world staged shows filled with new expressions and an audience to match.

headline.main: Bill Cunningham | A Breath of Fresh Air

snippet: Young members of the experimental art world and the unorthodox fashion world staged shows filled with new expressions and an audience to match.
